Monvvo Privacy Policy

Introduction

At Monvvo, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard any information that may be collected when you visit our website, Monvvo.com. By accessing or using our site, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

Information We Collect

Monvvo does not directly collect or store personal information. However, we use Google Analytics, which may collect limited information about your visit to help us understand website performance and improve user experience. This information may include:

  • Your browser type
  • Pages you visit on our site
  • Time spent on the site
  • General location (city/country, not specific addresses)

We do not use this data to personally identify you.

Cookies and Tracking Technologies

Monvvo uses cookies and similar technologies for the following purposes:

  • To support functionality and improve your experience.

Cookies used on this site may include:

  • Essential Cookies: Required for the site to function properly.
  • Analytics Cookies: Used by Google Analytics to measure website traffic and usage.

You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings. However, this may affect your user experience on the site.

For more details about Google Analytics cookies, visit Googleâ€™s Cookie Usage.

Third-Party Services

We may integrate third-party services, such as:

  • Google Analytics: Used to track and analyze site traffic. For more information, refer to the Google Privacy Policy.
  • Google Ads (if implemented): Used to display advertisements based on user interests.

These services may collect data according to their own privacy policies.

Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. However, non-personally identifiable information collected by Google Analytics or other third-party tools may be shared with their respective services.

Intended Audience

Monvvo is designed for adults who are exploring mortgage-related information and tools. It is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 18 or those not making financial decisions.

Your Privacy Choices

  • Opt-Out of Google Analytics: You can prevent Google Analytics from collecting your data by installing the Google Analytics Opt-Out Browser Add-On.
  • Manage Cookies: Use your browser settings to block or delete cookies.

Updates to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or services. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@monvvo.com.
